Description of incident: "A hospital representative said some boxes were misplaced while moving boxes of patient files from one storage unit to another.In a release, the hospital said, “While transferring boxes from our storage vendor, Access, to another one of our storage vendors, Iron Mountain, we discovered on or about Aug. 17, 2016, boxes containing patient information were inadvertently misplaced.” Hospital officials said they believe the boxes are “most likely located in either Access or Iron Mountain’s secure facility.”More Information: http://www.wftv.com/news/local/boxes-of-patient-information-missing-from...
